about_the_game:
The game has a simplistic, colorful artstyle, that is inviting when played through.
In this game you have to overcome more than 85+ increasingly challengeing levels.
By getting the timing, positionplay and mechanics right,
you will succed in reaching the end goal of each level.
Now with level selection, Normal and Challenge Mode.

By jumping and running around from one block to another, over
moving platforms, rotating obstacles and various other logic puzzles.
When the red end block is reached, you will be transported to
the next level.

Fun for all ages and skill levels.
Great challenge with increasing difficulty.
A game to casually immerse yourself with.
No microtransactions, no agegated content, just pure fun.
Can help, when you need distraction.
Replayable. Speedrun viable.
detailed_description:
The game has a simplistic, colorful artstyle, that is inviting when played through.
In this game you have to overcome more than 85+ increasingly challengeing levels.
By getting the timing, positionplay and mechanics right,
you will succed in reaching the end goal of each level.
Now with level selection, Normal and Challenge Mode.

By jumping and running around from one block to another, over
moving platforms, rotating obstacles and various other logic puzzles.
When the red end block is reached, you will be transported to
the next level.

Fun for all ages and skill levels.
Great challenge with increasing difficulty.
A game to casually immerse yourself with.
No microtransactions, no agegated content, just pure fun.
Can help, when you need distraction.
Replayable. Speedrun viable.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb DDR3
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: the game has sound, having a soundcard might be beneficial
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 mb DDR3
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: the game has sound, having a soundcard might be beneficial

short_description: Immerse yourself in the colorful and simplistic world of "Impossible Jumpy Quest". In this Single-Player experience you will Jump'n Run through increasingly more challanging levels. Find your own way through each of it's unique logic based levels. A new adventure is waiting for you.
